request.description:
Use this endpoint to programmatically retrieve API tokens. Tokens have a short expiry, and must be renewed frequently by your application.

This is the only endpoint in the API that supports Basic Authentication. Provide a valid Base64-encoded username and password, and the response will contain a JSON Web Token for use with all other endpoints.

For more information, see the API usage guide.
